summary: Before he portrayed the legendary blind swordsman, Zatoichi, Shintaro Katsu played Suganoichi, a blind court masseur with a dark side. An outcast since birth, he learned from a young age ... See full summary »
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Tamao Nakamura|Mieko Kondô|Matasaburô Niwa|Jôji Tsurumi|Mayumi Kurata|Tôru Abe|Fujio Suga|Ichirô Izawa|Shinobu Araki|San'emon Arashi|Osamu Maruyama|Yôko Wakasugi|Ryônosuke Azuma|Saburô Date|Jun Fujikawa|Setsuko Hama|Yûji Hamada|Seishirô Hara|Takashi Hata|Kin'ya Ichikawa|Akiko Inoue|Gen Kimura|Bonta Maru|Ryûzaburô Mitsuoka|Kôichi Mizuhara|Tokio Oki|Sôji Shibata|Kazue Tamaki|Mitsugu Terashima|Yûsaku Terashima|Hiroki Yamamoto|Fumihiko Yokoyama
title: Shiranui kengyô
